Body:
s = spectrographs.gemini_gmos.GeminiGMOSSHamSpectrograph()
example_file = os.path.join(os.environ['PYPEIT_DEV'], 'RAW_DATA',
    'gemini_gmos', 'GS_HAM_R400_700', 'S20181005S0085.fits.gz')
assert os.path.isfile(example_file
    ), 'Could not find example file for Gemini GMOS-S Ham read.'
det = 1
_, data, hdu, exptime, rawdatasec_img, oscansec_img = s.get_rawimage(
    example_file, det)
bpm = s.bpm(example_file, det)
assert data.shape == (512, 1152)
assert bpm.shape == (1024, 512)
dev_suite_required
